languages.text: {n}Кибелла подбирает голову с палубы и со странной тоской всматривается в потухшие глаза.{/n} "Борьба — это не люди. Борьба — это идеи, а люди — лишь переносчик идей. Носитель борьбы".

{n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла подбирает голову с палубы и со странной тоской всматривается в потухшие глаза.{/n} "Борьба — это не люди. Борьба — это идеи, а люди — лишь переносчик идей. Носитель борьбы".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah hebt den abgetrennten Kopf vom Deck auf und blickt mit seltsamer Wehmut in die toten Augen.{/n} "Der Kampf sind nicht die Leute. Der Kampf sind Ideen, und die Leute sind lediglich ihre Gefäße – die Träger des Kampfes."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah hebt den abgetrennten Kopf vom Deck auf und blickt mit seltsamer Wehmut in die toten Augen.{/n} "Der Kampf sind nicht die Leute. Der Kampf sind Ideen, und die Leute sind lediglich ihre Gefäße – die Träger des Kampfes."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah recoge la cabeza cortada y observa sus ojos apagados con una extraña añoranza.{/n} «La lucha no es entre personas. La lucha es entre ideales, y las personas son solo sus receptáculos; los portadores de la lucha».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah recoge la cabeza cortada y observa sus ojos apagados con una extraña añoranza.{/n} «La lucha no es entre personas. La lucha es entre ideales, y las personas son solo sus receptáculos; los portadores de la lucha».

languages.text: {n}キベラはデッキから切断された頭を拾い上げ、なぜだか切なそうにその光のない目を見つめる。{/n}「争いは人間ではない。争いとは思想であり、人はその器…つまり争いの運び手にすぎないのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはデッキから切断された頭を拾い上げ、なぜだか切なそうにその光のない目を見つめる。{/n}「争いは人間ではない。争いとは思想であり、人はその器…つまり争いの運び手にすぎないのよ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈甲板上捡起被砍下的头颅，带着某种古怪的渴切，凝视着头颅逐渐失去光泽的双眼。{/n}“斗争的不是人。斗争的是思想，而人只不过是思想的容器，是斗争的载体。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈甲板上捡起被砍下的头颅，带着某种古怪的渴切，凝视着头颅逐渐失去光泽的双眼。{/n}“斗争的不是人。斗争的是思想，而人只不过是思想的容器，是斗争的载体。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ramasse la tête coupée et plonge son regard étrangement triste dans les yeux éteints.{/n} « La lutte ne se limite pas aux gens. La lutte est une affaire d'idées dont les gens ne sont que les vecteurs... les vecteurs de la lutte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah ramasse la tête coupée et plonge son regard étrangement triste dans les yeux éteints.{/n} « La lutte ne se limite pas aux gens. La lutte est une affaire d'idées dont les gens ne sont que les vecteurs... les vecteurs de la lutte. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, kesilen kafayı güverteden kaldırarak ışığı sönmüş gözlerine tuhaf bir efkârla bakıyor.{/n} "Mücadele insanlarla değildi. Mücadele fikirlerleydi. İnsanlar, fikirlerin aracılarından ibarettir. Mücadelenin taşıyıcılarıdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah picks up the severed head from the deck and gazes into its extinguished eyes with a strange wistfulness.{/n} "The struggle is not people. The struggle is ideas, and people are merely their vessels — the carriers of the struggle."
